sentence.Network_en: She kept vigil at the bedside of her critically ill son.
sentence.Network_cn: 她整夜都守在病重的儿子床边。

sentence.Network_en: This has given him a disposition to consider our traditions critically.
sentence.Network_cn: 这使他倾向以批判眼光看待我们的传统。

sentence.Network_en: Economic prosperity depends critically on an open world trading system.
sentence.Network_cn: 经济繁荣关键要靠一个开放的世界贸易体系。

entry.def: A critical time, factor, or situation is extremely important.

example.ex: The incident happened at a critical point in the campaign...
example.tran: 该事件发生在竞选活动的关键时期。

example.ex: Environmentalists say a critical factor in the city's pollution is its population...
example.tran: 环境保护主义者说造成该城市污染问题的一个关键因素是其人口数量。

entry.def: A critical situation is very serious and dangerous.

example.ex: The German authorities are considering an airlift if the situation becomes critical...
example.tran: 如果局势变得危急，德国当局将考虑实施空运。

example.ex: Its day-to-day finances are in a critical state.
example.tran: 其日常财务状况十分糟糕。

entry.def: If a person is critical or in a critical condition in hospital, they are seriously ill.

example.ex: Ten of the injured are said to be in critical condition.
example.tran: 据说伤者中有10人情况危急。

entry.def: To be critical of someone or something means to criticize them.

example.ex: His report is highly critical of the trial judge...
example.tran: 他在报告中对主审法官有颇多批评。

example.ex: ...a few dozen intellectuals who've been critical of the regime...
example.tran: 几十名一直批判该政权的知识分子

entry.def: A critical approach to something involves examining and judging it carefully.

example.ex: We need to become critical text-readers...
example.tran: 我们需要培养对文章的评判能力。

example.ex: Marx's work was more than a critical study of capitalist production.
example.tran: 马克思的著作不仅仅是对资本主义生产的批判性研究。

entry.def: If something or someone receives critical acclaim, critics say that they are very good.

example.ex: The film met with considerable critical and public acclaim...
example.tran: 该影片受到了影评人和公众的高度评价。

example.ex: The show was also a resounding critical success.
example.tran: 这次演出同样好评如潮。

auth_sentence.content: It is also critically important when making ice cream.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is also critically important when making ice cream.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is also critically important when making ice cream.

auth_sentence.content: Gharial crocodiles are now officially catagorised as critically endangered.
auth_sentence.res_content: Gharial crocodiles are now officially catagorised as critically endangered.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Gharial crocodiles are now officially catagorised as critically endangered.

auth_sentence.content: Welch and Rawlings have released five critically acclaimed albums.
auth_sentence.res_content: Welch and Rawlings have released five critically acclaimed albums.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Welch and Rawlings have released five critically acclaimed albums.

Sentence.sentence: Develop a habit of reading critically.

sentences.cn: 不要不加批判地接受一切。

sentences.en: Critically examine your work as if you were looking at someone else’s efforts.
sentences.cn: 要像评价别人的工作一样，一丝不苟地检查你自己的工作。

sentences.en: Bass examined the quality of the furniture critically.
sentences.cn: 巴斯以挑剔的目光检查家具的质量。

sentences.en: Last night she was critically ill in intensive care.
sentences.cn: 昨晚她病危，处于重病特别护理中。

sentences.en: The plane was critically disabled when one of the engines caught fire.
sentences.cn: 有一台引擎起火,使飞机严重受损。
